Header.title: ONLINE IRIS ANALYSIS
Header.paragraph: Quick and easy method of observing an iris in consultation. You can identify an iridological sign in the 360º and its ring on any iridology map.

About.title: PAGE FOR IRIDOLOGISTS
About.paragraph: Iridologia.site has tools for daily use in an iridology clinic, our website is simplified and adapted to Computer. Soon it will be adapted to Tablet and Smartphone. You can access anywhere, you just need a browser and an Internet connection.

Gallery.title: Gallery
Gallery.paragraph1: TOOL USED: Rotating ruler (with 360º marker + 60 minutes) Rotary marker (with 2 x 180º marker) ASSESSMENT: Right iris, strong hematogenous with anxiety rings. Psora at 255º (lung).
Gallery.paragraph2: TOOL USED: Rotating ruler (with 360º marker + 60 minutes counterclockwise) Rotating marker (with 4 x 90º marker) EVALUATION: Left iris, mixed bile. With gap at 250º and psora at 175º.
Gallery.paragraph3: TOOL USED: Rotating ruler (with 360º marker + 60 minutes counterclockwise) Rotating marker (with 2 x 90º marker) EVALUATION: Mixed right bile iris with tulip gap at 80º (thyroid).
Gallery.paragraph4: TOOL USED: Rotating ruler (with 360º + 60 minutes marker) Rotating marker (with 12 x 30º marker) EVALUATION: Iris left bile mixed with strong constitution. Psora at 146º + 188º + 211º + 219º.
Gallery.paragraph5: TOOL USED: Rotating ruler (with 360º + 60 minute marker) Rotating marker (with 2 x 180º marker) EVALUATION: Right iris, strong bile mixture. With introflexion at 56 years (25th)
Gallery.paragraph8: Rotary marker (with 2 x 90º marker) Rotary marker (with 4 x 90º marker)
Gallery.paragraph9: Rotary marker (with 12 x 30º marker) Rotary marker (with 2 x 180º marker)

Contact.title: CONTACT US
Contact.paragraph: Fill out the form below to send us an email and we will contact you as soon as possible.

PrivacyAndPolicy.title: Privacy and policy
PrivacyAndPolicy.privacy1: The information provided may be modified at any time without notice.
PrivacyAndPolicy.privacy3: By accessing and registering on this site, to have access to the iridologia.online application, the user declares to have understood and accepted the terms of use presented here, without the need for any other consent.
PrivacyAndPolicy.privacy5: The iridologia.online application uses cookies (small text files placed on your device) and similar technologies to provide our services and help collect data. The text of a cookie often consists of a sequence of numbers and letters that uniquely identifies your computer, but can also contain other information. Many other websites and applications also contain web beacons or other similar technologies, as described below.
PrivacyAndPolicy.privacy6: Our Use of Cookies and Similar Technologies
PrivacyAndPolicy.privacy7: The iridologia.online application uses cookies and similar technologies for several purposes, including:
PrivacyAndPolicy.privacy8: Store your Preferences and Settings. You can store the settings that allow our services to perform correctly or that maintain your preferences over time on your device.
PrivacyAndPolicy.privacy9: Login and Authentication. When you sign in to the app, we store a unique ID number and login time in an encrypted cookie on your device. This cookie allows you to browse the pages of the website without having to sign in again on each page.
PrivacyAndPolicy.privacy10: Analysis. In order to provide our services, we use cookies and other identifiers to gather performance and usage data. For example, we use cookies to count the number of unique visitors to a website or service, and to develop other statistics about the operations of our services.
PrivacyAndPolicy.privacy12: The user may be asked to provide information in online forms. This guarantees and declares that the information provided is true, accurate, current and complete and must be maintained while using this site as a user.
PrivacyAndPolicy.privacy14: The user admits and agrees that any text, audio, image, code (software) or any other content conveyed by the pages of the iridologia.online application is protected by intellectual property rights, including, but not limited to, copyright author (moral and patrimonial), trademark rights, patents, trade names, domain names and industrial and trade secrets.
PrivacyAndPolicy.privacy15: Users are not allowed to reproduce, modify, reverse engineer, compile, decompile, transmit, publish, sub-license, permit, authorize, rent, sell, distribute, or in any other way use or transfer the content directly or indirectly without prior and express written authorization from Terapy Hygeia.
PrivacyAndPolicy.privacy17: Terapy Hygeia does not guarantee that the software contained is error-free. If these are detected they will be promptly corrected. Terapy Hygeia uses Google servers and is not responsible for situations where, due to technical problems, they may render the service unavailable, making it impossible to use the application. Terapy Hygeia will communicate to users any event that is beyond their technical responsibility.
PrivacyAndPolicy.privacy18: The user must verify that in the country in which he uses this application it complies with all the required legalities.
PrivacyAndPolicy.privacy19: THE REASON FOR BEING AND PUBLISHING THIS PRIVACY POLICY:
PrivacyAndPolicy.privacy20: In addition to implementing it in its organizational processes, Terapy Hygeia. drafted this Privacy Policy in order to make available, make known and publicize an instrument explaining the general rules of privacy and treatment of the personal data it collects, always in strict compliance with the Legislation.
PrivacyAndPolicy.privacy21: What is prescribed in this Privacy Policy complements what is stipulated in the same matter in the contracts, formal or informal, that the target parties celebrate with Terapy Hygeia.
PrivacyAndPolicy.privacy22: Terapy Hygeia expressly reserves the right to change this privacy policy at all times, the result of which is duly publicized by the same means.
PrivacyAndPolicy.privacy24: Personal data will mean any information or record, of any nature and regardless of its support or format, namely sound, image, writing, chirograph or characteristic, relating to the identified or identifiable natural person.
PrivacyAndPolicy.privacy25: The person who is able to be directly or indirectly identified by reference to one or more specific personal data, considered in isolation or combined with each other, in particular their physical, physiological, psychological, economic, ethnic, cultural, geographical, social identity, is identifiable. or your location.
PrivacyAndPolicy.privacy26: THE ENTITY RESPONSIBLE FOR THE PROCESSING OF PERSONAL DATA:
PrivacyAndPolicy.privacy27: The entity responsible for the collection and processing of personal data on the website www.iridologia.site is Terapy Hygeia, which, in the context of the relationships it maintains with the holder of personal data, establishes, always on a lawful and legitimate basis, which data is collected , the means of treatment and the purposes of such collection and treatment. Types of personal data collected and processed:
PrivacyAndPolicy.privacy28: In the scope of its activity, Terapy Hygeia collects and treats, namely:
PrivacyAndPolicy.privacy29: 1. Personal data needed to provide services to your customers and receive goods and services from your suppliers.
PrivacyAndPolicy.privacy30: 2. Personal data needed to execute the employment contract with your employees.
PrivacyAndPolicy.privacy31: 3. Personal data necessary to comply with legal obligations, either to public entities or to private entities.
PrivacyAndPolicy.privacy32: 4. Data necessary for the management of customers and suppliers, the contracting and management of the contractual relationship with customers and suppliers, the adequacy of the provision of services suited to the needs and interests of the Customer, including the sending of suggestions and information and marketing actions.
PrivacyAndPolicy.privacy33: 5. All personal data necessary for the exercise of Terapy Hygeia's rights within the scope of the relationships mentioned in the previous items, and in the pursuit of its activity and legitimate interest, namely, accounting, tax and administrative management, litigation management, judicial proof, fraud detection, revenue and audit protection, network and systems management, information security and physical security control, and facility security. Regardless of compliance with legal norms, or legitimate orders from a competent authority, regarding the conservation and transmission of data, Terapy Hygeia proceeds only to the processing of personal data necessary for its activity, in the fair and strict measure required by the nature of the contractual relationship or of another nature, established with the holder of such data, or with the prior, legitimate, lawful and informed consent, if any.
PrivacyAndPolicy.privacy34: TIME LIMITS FOR THE CONSERVATION OF YOUR PERSONAL DATA:
PrivacyAndPolicy.privacy35: Whereever there is a specific legal requirement that requires you to keep the data for a minimum period of time, this will be observed by Terapy Hygeia.
PrivacyAndPolicy.privacy36: Therapy Hygeia will keep your personal data stored for the minimum period of time and strictly necessary for the purpose for which the information is collected and processed, after which it will be deleted.
PrivacyAndPolicy.privacy37: MEASURES WE TAKE FOR THE SECURITY OF YOUR PERSONAL DATA:
PrivacyAndPolicy.privacy38: Therapy Hygeia observes the best practices, for which it adopts the technical and organizational measures appropriate to the risk, in the area of ​​security and protection of personal data, having approved and implemented a demanding plan of compliance with the objectives, the Law and the interest of the holders of personal data, capable of safeguarding the protection of the data made available to us by all those who in any way relate to us, in order to protect them against their dissemination, loss, misuse, alteration, treatment or access unauthorized as well as against any other form of unlawful treatment.
